name: Dans L'Isolement, Solidaires. 5-way international split featuring the Plague Sermon
description: Released by Dog Knights Productions. This release features our old favourite "Ships of the Dead, Lost to the Sun" Recorded by John Hannon. These come on slick looking mid-grey vinyl with printed sleeves and black disco bags. I also have a few copies left on clear splattered vinyl which look even nicer ;)

name: Dying in Motion / Heads and Heads / Virginia on Duty / the Plague Sermon 4-way split 12"
description:
4 way split featuring international screamo neer-do-wells; Dying in Motion (Switzerland), Heads and Heads (Spain), Virginia on Duty (Malaysia), and the Plague Sermon (United Kingdom). Features the track "You Are My Beating Heart" Recorded by John Hannon.
Realeased by Locked Groove, Adagio 830, Arctic Radar, Synalgie Records, Midmarch Records and Chenier Cell Records.

name: Balboa / Plague Sermon - Split Record [Translucent Brown 12" Vinyl]
description:
Magic Bullet Records (USA) and Midmarch Records (UK) present a cross atlantic split release between two of heavy musics greatest kept secrets, Philadelphia's Balboa and Brighton based Plague Sermon. Balboa follow split releases with Rosetta (Level-Plane) and Aussitot Mort (Forge Again) and bring you their most accomplished chaotic hardcore to date, that would appeal to fans of Majority Rule, Cursed and Young Widows. Plague Sermon have taken half a stride out of their screamo past, and bring forth 15 minutes of at times apocalyptic, and at times frantic, post metal that would appeal to lovers of Boris, Drowning with our Anchors and City of Caterpillar. The vinyl release is beautifully presented with artwork from Richard Forbes-Hamilton, who has taken care of art for ASVA, and limited to 330 copies on Translucent Brown Vinyl.

Track Listing

Boys in the Creeks
Muerto Por Eleccion
Bury the Lies
State of Exception
We are Both Drowning
The Doves Fly North, The City is Forsaken

name: Plague Sermon / Grizzly Twister Split 7" (white vinyl)
description: Split 7" with Sweden's the Grizzly Twister. Contains "Sigmar" and "Lets Take a Swim in Lake You". This was our first release comprising material from our first recording session. Thought this sold out years ago but I've just found another two copies in an old merch box!

name: Deer Tee
description:
Deer T-Shirt Blue Print on Black
Sizes M, L
Just found the last four shirts in a merch box - 2 mediums and 2 larges printed on Gildan Heavy Cotton. Atrwork by Richard Forbes-Hamilton.
